subject: Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: O’Sullivan, 52, a former Ireland national coach, had been in charge of the Americans for two and a half years and oversaw their participation at this year’s World Cup.
snippet: O’Sullivan, 52, a former Ireland national coach, had been in charge of the Americans for two and a half years and oversaw their participation at this year’s World Cup.
